comments.author: Shylock.4653
comments.body:
Pat Cavit.9234:

We’re still trying to figure out what the plan will be going forward. Nothing to report yet.

Any news on this?

comments.author: Malediktus.3740
comments.body:
Ok, thank you for the update.

Can you unlock “Mini Mushroom Stomper” in the API? It is currently only available via the auto unlock from the new black lion chest item, so it might skip the whitelisting process.

comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body:
We’re still trying to figure out what the plan will be going forward. Nothing to report yet.

This did remind me to go rip through the whitelisting queue though, I’ll try to get to that more regularly from here on out.

comments.author: Malediktus.3740
comments.body:
So with Lawton being on absence for an unknown time again, what will happen to the API in the forseeable future? The bank API is broken and stuff is not getting whitelisted anymore currently.
Since over 100k players are making use of the API, I think it should be one of Anets top priorities to keep everything working even if Lawton is missing (yet again).
